It’s fantastic! #KSP<br/><br/></p>
Lookin good.
With bloopers! Awesome!

Guard13007 tell us everything about the it in 2 minutes!

Video is 4:25 long, I am confused
I first thought that the title meant that 1.05 was coming out in 2 minutes . . .

something mixed in there? it sounds from the video as if even KSPedia would be in 1.0.5.

I know, its not - but the video makes it seem as if.

Even his notes on github are confusing. I dont know if its a good decission to provide those kind of information in "video wednesday" - makes them seem to be official / signed by squad.

  • Crew portraits redesigned, smooth scroll, not locked to 3 views, they're looking into adding more functionality (more views at once, expand to view all, etc).
  • KSPedia is looking great, lots of work is being put into making all the information easily accessible and not overwhelming

Toose are 1.1 features - as advertised, arent they?

Edited November 4, 2015 by Speadge

Really? A video which just reads out points from a week old post is now Daily Kerbal worthy? Is this really the best KSP video from this week you could find?

that's because the Bloopers are in Audio form.
